mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_default_extract_result (Id, TaskLogId, Duration, WebsiteId, Status, Remark, Url, UniqueSign,UniqueMd5, ResultType, StoragePath, CreatedAt) values (#{id}, #{taskId}, #{duration}, #{websiteId}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{url}, #{uniqueSign},#{uniqueMd5}, #{resultType}, #{storagePath}, now())
